name: Zombie Vs Biker - Free Dirt Bike 3D Shooting Game
name_original: Zombie Vs Biker - Free Dirt Bike 3D Shooting Game
description:
The sunny ocean coast is now taken over by evil zombies. Get your special bike and kill them all!

Feel the thrill of racing like never before in this action-packed, heart-thumping 'Zombies vs Biker' Bike racing Game .

Go ahead and live out your racing dream.

FEATURES:
*Ragdoll Physics
*26 Exciting Levels
* Crazy addictive gameplay with ultra smooth tilt controls
* Eye popping high definition 3D graphics
* Environments that keeps changing
* Life like character animations and physics
* Endless game play.
* 10 Bikes to select for racing
